name: Mysha Or Mysh
greetingText: I really like your name the second btw!
wishText: May the best people be always with you and may you get the ammount of love you deserve and may we stay together and next birthday we celebrate together....I love you so much enjoy! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
